Articles.Content: This would prevent us from thinking we quicksaved in our current game, restoring, and discovering that we last quicksaved 3 days ago.

This would prevent us from thinking we quicksaved in our current game, restoring, and discovering that we last quicksaved 3 days ago.

And what if you actually want to restore to your previous quicksave? Too bad, you can't, it has been deleted. No thanks!

A better option would be an automated second quicksave as soon as you quickload. If this turns out to be the wrong quicksave you can always go back to to just before the quickload.
Yeah, no thanks. I prefer being able to quickload from between game sessions, without the game deleting it..
Or you just think for 2 seconds before quickloading. I can't even imagine how drunk someone must be to make such a mistake, it just sounds to stupid
No need to be an ass about it.
